participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, always looking for new experiences
participant_1.background: I like to take up new hobbies, like skiing, to keep my mind and body active. My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine. i love 80s music. I am a hard-working family man looking for a home that is perfect for my family. i have three dogs and two cats.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: humorous and creative, with a passion for planning events and making people smile
participant_2.background: I'm looking for a place with more space for my stamp collection and my three dogs. I was a florist before I became a wedding planner. my parents are not married anymore. my parents live in kentucky. i am a very funny woman.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I like to take up new hobbies, like skiing, to keep my mind and body active.
That's awesome! I love skiing too. Do you go skiing often?
Not as often as I would like to, but I try to go a few times a year.
Where do you like to ski?
I like to go to the mountains in Colorado.
That's a great place to ski! I've been there a few times and I love it.
It's a beautiful place to ski and the snow is always great.
Do you like any other types of outdoor activities?
I love hiking, camping, and fishing.
Those are all great activities! I love hiking and camping too.
We should go skiing together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to go skiing with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
